statements: SELECT * FROM retention_policy;
SELECT policy_name, retention_duration FROM retention_policy WHERE is_active = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM retention_policy ORDER BY retention_duration DESC;
SELECT policy_name, retention_duration FROM retention_policy WHERE policy_name LIKE 'Policy%' AND is_active = TRUE;
SELECT id, policy_name, retention_duration FROM retention_policy WHERE retention_duration >= 30;
SELECT * FROM retention_policy WHERE is_active = TRUE ORDER BY policy_name DESC;
SELECT policy_name, retention_duration FROM retention_policy WHERE retention_duration >= 30 ORDER BY retention_duration ASC;
SELECT id, policy_name FROM retention_policy WHERE retention_duration < 10 AND is_active = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM retention_policy WHERE retention_duration BETWEEN 10 AND 20 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT policy_name, COUNT(*) as count FROM retention_policy GROUP BY policy_name HAVING count > 1 ORDER BY count DESC;
SELECT * FROM data_retention_policies
SELECT id, policy_name FROM data_retention_policies ORDER BY policy_name DESC
SELECT * FROM archived_data WHERE archived_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT original_id, archived_data FROM archived_data WHERE archived_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT policy_name, retention_period FROM data_retention_policies WHERE retention_period > 10 ORDER BY retention_period
SELECT * FROM data_retention_policies WHERE id = 1;
SELECT policy_name, retention_period FROM data_retention_policies WHERE retention_period > 30;
SELECT id, policy_name FROM data_retention_policies ORDER BY policy_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM archived_data WHERE archived_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT original_id, JSON_VALUE(archived_data, '$.key') as key_value FROM archived_data WHERE JSON_VALUE(archived_data, '$.type') = 'important';
SELECT * FROM retention_policies;
SELECT policy_id, policy_name FROM retention_policies ORDER BY policy_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM data_to_be_retained WHERE is_archived = TRUE;
SELECT data_id, data_type, creation_date FROM data_to_be_retained WHERE creation_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT data_id, data_type, archive_date FROM data_to_be_retained JOIN archived_data ON data_to_be_retained.data_id = archived_data.original_data_id;
SELECT * FROM retention_policies ORDER BY policy_id DESC;
SELECT policy_name, retention_period FROM retention_policies WHERE retention_period > '30 days';
SELECT data_id, data_type, creation_date FROM data_to_be_retained WHERE is_archived = TRUE;
SELECT data_id, data_type, creation_date FROM data_to_be_retained WHERE creation_date BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-12-31';
SELECT * FROM archived_data JOIN data_to_be_retained ON archived_data.original_data_id = data_to_be_retained.data_id;
SELECT * FROM data_retention_policy;
SELECT policy_name, retention_period FROM data_retention_policy WHERE retention_period > 10;
SELECT name, industry FROM business ORDER BY industry DESC;
SELECT id, data_value, creation_date FROM data_record WHERE creation_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT archive_date, archived_data FROM data_archive ORDER BY archive_date ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM data_retention_policy;
SELECT id, policy_name, retention_period FROM data_retention_policy ORDER BY retention_period DESC;
SELECT * FROM business WHERE industry = 'Technology';
SELECT name, industry FROM business WHERE id = 1;
SELECT a.id, a.archive_date, d.data_value FROM data_archive a JOIN data_record d ON a.retention_policy_id = d.id;
SELECT * FROM retention_policy;
SELECT policy_name, retention_period FROM retention_policy WHERE retention_period > 365;
SELECT archive_id, archive_data FROM data_archive ORDER BY archive_date DESC;
SELECT log_type, log_date FROM retention_log WHERE log_type = 'automatic';
SELECT entry_id, data_value FROM data_entry LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM retention_policy ORDER BY retention_period DESC;
SELECT policy_name, retention_period FROM retention_policy WHERE retention_period > 30;
SELECT * FROM data_entry WHERE entry_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01' ORDER BY entry_date DESC;
SELECT archive_data FROM data_archive WHERE archive_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY archive_date ASC;
SELECT log_id, log_type FROM deletion_log INNER JOIN retention_log ON deletion_log.log_id = retention_log.log_id WHERE log_type = 'deletion' ORDER BY log_date DESC;
